title: S4 Ep20: The financial system and climate risk
itunes:title: The financial system and climate risk
description: The latest Barcelona Report from the CEPR discusses how central banks and asset managers should manage climate and natural disaster risks. Xavier Vives tells Tim Phillips what the report has to say about mandates, hedging and resilience.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
